name: Shit Poster
description: For the shitposters.

name: Pepe
description: For those that pepe post.

name: Stoner
description: Your words drift slow, hazy, and kinda profound if you think about it.

name: Bad Boy
description: Illegal, loud, and two turns ahead.

name: GPT User
description: Where others think, you autocomplete.

name: The Seducer
description: You dont chase. You lure- and they always follow.

name: Drunken Shield
description: Steel in your grip, hops in your breath.

name: The Broker
description: Charts rise, charts crash and you profit.

name: Dragon's Breath
description: Your trail burns hot smoke & fire clings to every message.

name: Last Drag
description: A quiet burn follows- low, slow, and final.

name: Poe Pilled
description: Your trail is candlelit, sorrow-soaked, and steeped in loss.

name: Cloak and Dagger
description: No name. No face. Just the job.

name: Icy Hot
description: You leave smoke and frostbite in equal measure.

name: Freakshow
description: Welcome to the show.

name: Sanguine Sip
description: A lust for blood.

name: Social Engineer
description: Your words arent loudâ€”theyre loaded. Every message is a breach in disguise.

name: The Monk
description: Your words are few, but they echo with balance, discipline, and peace.

name: Life Saver
description: You dont type to impress. You type to save.

name: Psychonaut
description: Each word bends perceptionâ€” a thought experiment in motion.

name: Krill Yourself
description: Krill yourself.

name: Rising Sun
description: Humanity discarded- only survival remains.

name: The Patriot
description: You dont type. You declare independence every damn time.

name: Spirits Walker
description: You move through the night, one pour at a time

name: The Researcher
description: Science doesnt ask for permission, neither do you.

name: Ice Age
description: Buried in permafrostâ€”ancient, cold, and unforgiving.

name: American Psycho
description: You have to return some video tapes.

name: Rick Grimes
description: One word away from mercy. One twitch from wrath.

name: NET. WORLDWIDE
description: Rep the original Net. WORLDWIDE.

name: Tidehunter
description: Salt-soaked and corpse filled, the Tidehunter drags all who follow into the deep.

name: The Unabomber
description: Philosophy mailed with a fuse.

name: Puddle V.3
description: Rep Puddle V3.

name: Honey Drip
description: Each message leaves a golden traceâ€”sweet, slow, and impossible to ignore.

name: Arcane Wizard
description: The elements answer. The scrolls obey. Your trail radiates power.

name: No Fly Zone
description: You cross the line.

name: High Roller
description: Money talks, but yours shuts the whole server up.
